channel.title: dtp on random user oriented graphic design
channel.description: Recent content in dtp on random user oriented graphic design

item.title: CNB - exhibition stand
item.description: Project: Exhibition stand & counter | Client: CNB - Czech National Bank | Year: 2019 Description: Exhibition stand and variable counter. Visual was produced on the stretch textile and backlit textile. Background pattern was created from coin shapes (extracted from design manual).

item.title: Konica Minolta exhibition
item.description: Project: Exhibition visual - Konica Minolta | Client: Konica Minolta | Year: 2019 Description: Konica Minolta - Technology show visual. Exhibition interpreted every business solution which company provides. Print material - PVC popup and PVC backlit.

item.title: Takeda exhibition stand
item.description: Project: Exhibition visual - Takeda | Client: Takeda | Year: 2018 Description: Takeda (Japanese pharmaceutical company) exhibition stand. Main keywords of the client’s request: traditional, white, clean, nature photo, wood.

item.title: Nu'Clinic Promo Flyer
item.description: Project: Nu’Clinic Promo Flyer | Client: Nu’Clinic | Year: 2018 Description: Unexpected “Hurry up” task for women’s beauty days event at client’s clinic.
